quote: I just made it a goal to try to post almost every day some kind of real estate content just to keep myself in front of all my people.
why_clipworthy: Demonstrates a practical, actionable strategy for staying top-of-mind.
suggested_hook: Want to stay top-of-mind in your market? Here's a simple daily strategy.

quote: It's not about being the highest offer, it's about being the most flexible offer.
why_clipworthy: Challenges the common belief that highest offer always wins.
suggested_hook: In a competitive market, flexibility can beat the highest bid.
